thread.title: £200,000 worth of prizes to be won
thread.title_full: £200,000 worth of prizes to be won - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: £200,000 worth of prizes to be won
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with Lotto to offer readers the chance to win a fantastic prize from our great draw - from the latest gadgets, including the iPad mini 4 and the Samsung Galaxy Tab S, to a Telegraph digital subscription, there is plenty to be won. There’s now a new Lotto Millionaire Raffle which guarantees a millionaire in every draw, which means alongside the jackpot, there are two chances to become a Lotto millionaire in every draw. Plus, if you match 2 numbers, you will now win a free Lotto Lucky Dip® for another chance to become a millionaire. In assocciation with How to enter: Simply fill in the form below and carefully enter your unique 19 digit Lotto Ticket number (found in the top left corner of any Lotto Ticket). You will need a Lotto Ticket valid between Saturday, October 10, 2015 and Saturday, November 7, 2015. Competition closes 23:59 on Saturday, October 31, 2015. Online Form - £200,000 worth of prizes to be won telegraph.co.uk
